page.title: 19THE RIVER CAM
page.content: THE RIVER IS JAMMED WITH PUNTS, THE DUCKS TRY TO AVOID THEM.THE WEIR ROARS AND WATER FOAMS BELOW.THE FISHERMEN ARE DEPRESSED,THE FISH ARE NOT BITING TODAY.THE VISITING FOREIGN LANGUAGE STUDENTS BABBLE AWAY IN A FOREIGN TONGUE.THE UNIVERSITY ROWERS PRACTICE- "IN.OUT.IN.OUT." CHILDREN RUN AROUND MAKING A LOT OF NOISE.IN THE OUTDOOR SWIMMING POOL LADIES SUNBATHE WHILE A FEW PEOPLE BRAVE THE ICY WATER.THE PLAYGROUND IS FULL OF CHILDREN.UNDER THE BRIDGE IT IS COOL AND DARK.AT THE "PUB" BARE CHEASTED DRINK BEER. A BOY JUMPS INTO THE RIVER,SOAKING A PASSING PUNTER. ...................................... THE RIVER CAM OR GRANTA IS A VERY POPULAR PLACE IN THE SUMMER.VISITORS LIKE TO{PUNT}ALONG THE BACKS,FROM THE RIVER THEY GET A GOOD VIEW OF THE COLLEGES,THE MANY BRIDGES AND STUDENTS
